data.name: labelEnableGrouping.Help
data.value: Check to enable grouping of news related to this agent module.

data.name: labelThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Set width in px for generated thumbnail images.

data.name: ThumbnailWidth.Invalid
data.value: Thumbnail width must be an integer from 1 to 4096.

data.name: labelGroupThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Set width in px for generated thumbnail images for grouped news entries.

data.name: GroupThumbnailWidth.Required
data.value: Thumbnail width in group is required.

data.name: GroupThumbnailWidth.Invalid
data.value: Thumbnail width in group must be an integer from 1 to 1024.
